document_data.name: Onthur
document_data.mainbody: '''Onthur''' was a caravan guard of the [[Sword Coast]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was stocky, compared to other guards.
document_data.History: Onthur was part of [[Orthil Voldovan]]'s caravan from [[Scornubel]] to [[Waterdeep]] in {{yearlink|1357}}. He was one of the people who searched [[Sabran]] and [[Mhegras]]' wagon mid-trip.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|155|10}}
